titles.title: When All Thy Mercies O My God (familiar easy t

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When all Thy mercies O my God My rising soul surverys Transported with the view I'm lost In wonder love and praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unnumbered comforts to my soul Thy tender care bestowed Before my infant heart conceived From whom those comforts flowed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When worn with sickness oft hast Thou With health renewed my face And when in sins and sorrows sunk Revived my soul with grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ten thousand thousand precious gifts My daily thanks employ Nor is the least a cheerful heart That tastes those gifts with joy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through ev'ry period of my life Thy goodness I'll pursue And after death in distant worlds The glorious theme renew{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through all eterntiy to Thee A joyful song I'll raise But oh eternity's too short To utter all Thy praise{/lang-eng}
